p: Phenylalanine ammonia lyase (EC 4.3.1.5) measured spectrophotometrically using the substrate trans‐cinnamic acid at 290 nm. Three ml of the reaction mixture, containing 0.8 ml supernatant and 50 mM l‐phenylalanine in sodium borate buffer (200 mM, pH = 8.8), was incubated at 37°C; after 90 min, the reaction was interrupted by ice water. The amount of enzyme caused 0.01 absorbance rise in 1 hr under the assay conditions defined as one unit of PAL activity. The specific PAL activity was expressed as U/mg protein.
